title: UR4MORE Discipleship Core
description: A comprehensive 12-week journey to follow Jesus deeply and multiply impact in your daily life. Build foundational habits, understand your identity in Christ, and learn to disciple others.

lessons.title: Follow Jesus 101
lessons.objective: Understand the gospel, grace, and the basics of following Jesus. Learn about baptism, church community, and what it means to be a disciple.

lessons.title: Habits of Grace
lessons.objective: Develop daily rhythms of Scripture reading, prayer, and Sabbath rest. Learn a 15-minute daily plan that fits your schedule.
practices: Start with 5 minutes of Bible reading
Plan one hour of Sabbath rest

lessons.title: Identity in Christ
lessons.objective: Discover who you are in Christ and how to 'die to self' while becoming more like Him. Learn to fight from victory, not for victory.
practices: Write down old vs. new identity

lessons.title: Obedience in the Everyday
lessons.objective: Develop a personal rule of life and learn habit stacking for spiritual growth. Make obedience practical and sustainable.
practices: Create your personal rule of life
Stack one new habit with existing routine

lessons.title: Community & Confession
lessons.objective: Learn peacemaking, forgiveness, and healthy rhythms of confession. Build authentic Christian community.
practices: Choose one person to forgive this week
Join or start a small group

lessons.title: Emotional Health
lessons.objective: Understand boundaries, grief, anxiety, and learn breath + Scripture micro-interventions for emotional wellness.

lessons.title: Work as Worship
lessons.objective: Understand vocation, integrity, and excellence. Learn to see your work as worship and service to God.
practices: Practice integrity in one workplace situation

lessons.title: Sharing the Hope
lessons.objective: Learn to share your story and engage in Alpha-style conversations about faith. Develop hospitality skills.

lessons.title: Serving & Gifts
lessons.objective: Discover and deploy your spiritual gifts. Learn about weekly serving and finding your place in ministry.
practices: Serve in one area this week

lessons.title: Generosity & Justice
lessons.objective: Understand biblical generosity with time, talent, and treasure. Learn about local mission and justice.
practices: Give one hour to local mission

lessons.title: Spiritual Warfare Basics
lessons.objective: Learn about the armor of God and freedom practices. Understand spiritual warfare and how to stand firm.
practices: Put on armor of God daily

lessons.title: Multiply
lessons.objective: Learn to disciple someone else and start a micro-group. Begin your journey as a disciple-maker.
